pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Install```bashpip install githubdata```# Quick Start```pythonfrom githubdata import get_data_wo_double_clone# GitHub "Data Repository" url/pathurl = 'imahdimir/d-TSETMC_ID-2-FirmTicker'# get the data as a pandas DataFramedf = get_data_wo_double_clone(url)```***Easy as that!***
